title: Arteries of life

description: Episode of Series "The Living Earth". Water and forests are shown as important elements in the "chain of life". It is demonstrated that topsoil is helpless in supplying and sustaining life unless aided by water, and that water itself depends on forests which provide humus in the soil to store and regulate the flow of water.
